import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import DropDown from '../DropDown' import ToggleSlider from '../ToggleSlider' import BarChartContainer from './BarNutzungsGründe' import '../../styles/charts.css' export default function Nutzungsgründe() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [property, setProperty] = useState("SocialMedia"); useEffect(() => { fetch("https://webhooks.mongodb-stitch.com/api/client/v2.0/app/dataviztest-bbcvc/service/viz/incoming_webhook/NG") .then(response => response.ok && response.json()) .then(datazugang => { setData( datazugang.sort((a, b) => a.GEO.localeCompare(b.GEO)) ); }) .catch(console.error); }, []); return (

Nutzungsgründe
